reviews: I bought two. Very happy with the quality. I have been doing renovations and they fit my decor perfectly. Love them.

Haven’t been able to put it to use yet as it was purchased as a Christmas gift, but we are looking forward to referring to it come the spring/summer when we start landscaping and gardening. We have 1/2 acre so I felt this book would be great for starting us off with a little garden!
Good information, but most of it is common sense.

I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas as he uses the Carhart brand quite a bit for workwear. It is too “tall”. We do not like the oversized look, I was expecting this hat to be a smaller, proper fit. I’m disappointed because he hasn’t worn this hat since I bought it for him, and most likely won’t wear it due to it being too big. It’s a shame because it looks like a really nice hat until it’s put on.
I can’t really review it in use as I got it for my boyfriend to travel with. He was really happy with it when I gave it to him, and instantly started packing it up for his carry on.

review_title: Great quality, fits perfect, he loves it!
reviews: I love it!! Bought it for my boyfriend as a going away gift for his first work trip! He’s an AME endorsed on Dash-800’s. He loves it as well.
